channel.title: Py Humble Software
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Software bundles!

item.title: The Audio Odyssey Bundle
item.content:encoded: Get all the audio you’ll ever need for your games, films, and other creative projects with this jam-packed bundle of royalty-free music and sound FX! Regardless of the vibe you’re trying to weave, you’ll be covered when it comes to music, with dedicated packs that span themes and genres—from fantasy, horror, and sci-fi, to ambient, classical, and chiptunes. Get ready to paint soundscapes with sound FX including creature sounds, combat clanks, futuristic beeps and chirps, and much more. Embark on an audio odyssey, and help support American Cancer Society with your purchase.

item.title: Everything you need to know about Godot 4 Encore Bundle
item.content:encoded: Master Godot—the lightweight, fast, and free game engine behind hits like Sonic Colors: Ultimate. Whether you want to use the brand new version 4 or the battle-tested version 3, these courses will get you building platformers, RPGs, first-person shooters, city-builders, strategy games, and more—no prior experience required! Plus, you’ll learn how to customize your games by creating your own art and assets, all while supporting Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: The A-Z of Full Stack Development
item.content:encoded: Are you a newbie coder at the start of your journey, or an experienced developer looking to elevate your skillset? This bundle of online video courses from Packt will help you hit the job market fully prepared and ahead of the curve! Learn to build robust, scalable web apps with Django 3’s full-stack Python-based framework. Master the ins and outs of managing containerized applications at scale with Kubernetes. Create stunning and performant front-end user experiences with React JS. Get job-ready with comprehensive courses on all these topics and more, and support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: The 2023 Learn Unity Game Development Bundle
item.content:encoded: Learn to create games with Unity with these online courses from GameDev.tv—including multiple courses being made available for the first time exclusively through Humble Bundle! This comprehensive curriculum covers core skills and advanced concepts for the powerful and popular development platform, and includes assets to help create your game projects. Find out how to make a 2D RPG combat system, VR experience, or turn-based strategy game. Get trained up on visual scripting, multiplayer, network coding, and more. Level up your Unity game dev skills, and help support SpecialEffect with your purchase!

item.title: Dream it, design it, build it! Professional home construction + Extensions
item.content:encoded: Are you a pro in the building, landscaping, or interior design trades? Or a DIYer looking to take the reins on your home remodel or landscaping project? This bundle of 3D CAD software from Ashampoo will help you bring your ideas to life! Including pro-grade software like 3D CAD Professional 10, Home Design 8, and a suite of specialized extensions for kitchens and offices, these tools will help you visualize your ideas beautifully and accurately. Get the tools you need to make your vision build-ready, and support Cancer Research UK and American Cancer Society with your purchase!

item.title: Production Powerhouse Bundle
item.description: Video, movie, and audio software from Magix
item.content:encoded:
Become a production powerhouse with this suite of software from MAGIX! This bundle features a mix of potent video and audio tools, including:
  • Video Pro X14, featuring intuitive video editing and professional tools.
  • ACID Pro 10, the creative DAW for loop- and sample-based work.
  • Movie Studio 2023, your entry into the world of video editing.
  • Plus, a library of Soundpools filled with thousands of loops.
Create movies and music like a pro, and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

item.title: "Bedroom to Billboards" - Your Complete Music Bundle
item.content:encoded: Make masterful modern music with this massive collection from Function Loops! This essential producer’s kit features 65 packs of 100% royalty-free samples, loops, one-shots, presets, vocals, MIDI files, and more from a wide range of today’s hottest genres. Pick up Vocal Secrets, Jazzy Hip Hop Cutz, and more to equip your home studio with thousands of versatile sound files that’ll help you reach new heights—and help support Music Will with your purchase!
